title: Follow The Money (Ep 1347)
description:
In this episode, I follow the money trail and I reveal who is really behind the Democrats’ plan for post-election chaos. 

News Picks:


Follow the money behind the coming coup.


What happens if the presidential election results in a tie? 

Evidence emerges that Biden is using a teleprompter to answer questions.


A theory about why the corrupt Mueller witch hunters deleted the contents of their phones. 

PA judge sets the bail for rioters at 1 million dollars each. Excellent!

Yes, ANTIFA is an organized terror group. Here’s the evidence.

Remember when Obama purged the upper level ranks of our military.
